answers.answer: It's possible, because of family history, he could have had uncontrolled diabetes-although personally I've never heard of diabetes getting to that point. It's also quite possible that he had some kind of reaction to his adhd drugs. However it may be something else all together. It's really difficult to know the exact cause but hopefully the doctors can get him sorted quickly. All prayers for your family and your brother.
